snippet.title: sm8791322 - 子供調査団Mighty Pockets 調査３（の初め）| Mighty Pockets Chousa 3 (Satellaview)
snippet.description:
Original NND URL:
http://www.nicovideo.jp/watch/sm8791322

Uploaded for the folks who don't check Satellablog.
http://superfamicom.org/blog
It doesn't look like any more of this is gonna be uploaded on NND, unfortunately.

This specific episode's ROM, for whatever reason, doesn't emulate well in anything - the farthest I can get is the 2nd screen, and then crash! It's particularly strange since the other two emulate A-Ok...

The game itself uses licensed music, so I won't be surprised by any potential copyright claims. Please support the original music artists!... Especially since a decent amount of them have faded into obscurity by now.
